name: secure-image-upload
description: Production-grade secure image upload system with deduplication and automatic cleanup

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dir=path.join('dist','db'); if(!fs.existsSync(dir))fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src','db','schema.sql'),path.join(dir,'schema.sql'));"
